meanings.definition: A tropical plant of the taro family, grown in the West Indies for its edible root.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested the eddo from his garden.
meanings.sent2: In the market, they sold fresh eddo roots.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel buried the eddo in the flower bed.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as hearty as a field of eddo plants.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cooking eddo filled the kitchen.
